column5: Guysand Gals, a gentlemen from England, Alex Prouse who is an accomplished Pike fisherman will be in the Buckhorn area from Sun July 27th till Wed August 6th. I had hoped to get up to my trailer and take him out Muskie fishing but I won't be able to...A friend took Alex out last year but he can't do it this year...Is there anyone that can be a good ambassador? Maybe get Alex into his first real ESOX!  Thanks,  Dax
Post this again when the date gets near.
